title: Is homeopathic treatment good for heart blockage?
description: Answer (1 of 7): If I say 'Yes' the skeptics of Homoeopathy would laugh it off sarcastically. But my firm answer is YES. Blockage of arteries of the heart is the reason for heart attacks (a major killer disease), right? In medical parlance it's called coronary artery disease (CAD). Depending u...
